amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 115-830 to provide funding for the U.S. Geological Survey to develop a map showing pyrrhotite occurrences across the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Courtney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
